versionA.text: Based on the original question, you and your partner each need to change one value of either s or number of patients so that the new calculated t is half. You are responsible to change the value of s=6.2 within the range of (4-8).

versionB.text: Based on the original question, you and your partner each need to change one value of either s or number of patients so that the new calculated t is half. You are responsible to change the value of the number of patients within the range of (10-50).
